page.title: 19Consett Fashions Lisa Herron
page.content: Description of fashions in Consett between ages (16-30).Young teenagers wear things like tight leather skirts, leg warmers mini skirts bat wing jumpers and frankie says relax t-shirts.20 year olds wear long skirts and tights bat wing jumpers and t-shirts. younger men were bleached jeans. Some of the younger people have luminous pink hairstyles. Some people only have spiky hair in the middle of their heads.they are called mohicans. Older women seem to like curly hair. Women wear high heeled shoes and slip-on shoes.For men a kind of slip on shoe has come into fashion. Some wear trainers, white cricket boots or shoes with laces.I would wear slip on shoes or tucker boots,leather skirt and WHAM t-shirt. Ilike bat wing jumpers V back dress or a RaaRaa skirt or dress. I sometimes wear trainers.
